_source.content: Easiest Way To Double Your Money | Eric SingletonIn today's world, everyone wants to be wealthy and financially secure, and cryptocurrency is the best option. However, some people have reservations about cryptocurrency. Eric Singleton, a seasoned cryptocurrency consultant, shared a list of cryptocurrency benefits here. This will assist you in learning more about cryptocurrency and gaining trust in cryptocurrency.Cryptocurrency market hours:Thanks to the shortage of centralized market governance, the cryptocurrency market is open for trading 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Cryptocurrency transactions occur between people all over the world on crypto exchanges. However, as the market shifts to modern facilities, there may be some free time. Increased liquidity. Cash flow is essential because it enables better pricing, faster transfer times, and more accurate technical analysis.Overall, the cryptocurrency market is regarded as illiquid due to the fact that transactions are scattered across different exchanges, with relatively small trades providing a massive impact on market prices. _source.contentraw:
Easiest Way To Double Your Money | Eric Singleton

In today's world, everyone wants to be wealthy and financially secure, and cryptocurrency is the best option. However, some people have reservations about cryptocurrency. Eric Singleton, a seasoned cryptocurrency consultant, shared a list of cryptocurrency benefits here. This will assist you in learning more about cryptocurrency and gaining trust in cryptocurrency.

Cryptocurrency market hours:
Thanks to the shortage of centralized market governance, the cryptocurrency market is open for trading 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Cryptocurrency transactions occur between people all over the world on crypto exchanges. However, as the market shifts to modern facilities, there may be some free time. Increased liquidity. Cash flow is essential because it enables better pricing, faster transfer times, and more accurate technical analysis.

Overall, the cryptocurrency market is regarded as illiquid due to the fact that transactions are scattered across different exchanges, with relatively small trades providing a massive impact on market prices. This exacerbates the volatility of cryptocurrency markets.

For more Information, visit: https://medium.com/@ericsingleton_/advantages-of-cryptocurrency-investment-eric-singleton-1da82e7207fe

_source.contentraw:
Man who drove at officer, harassed Trump rally sentenced

WICHITA, Kan.

A Wichita man has been sentenced to 30 months in prison after authorities said he tried to run over a Sedgwick County courthouse police officer and harassed demonstrators at a rally in 2020 supporting former president Donald Trump.

Justin Young, 33, pleaded guilty to assault on Dec. 17.

Prosecutors and Young's attorneys had recommended probation because Young was experiencing mental health issues after the death of his father in the days before the Nov. 22, 2020, rally. But Sedgwick County District Judge Eric Williams disagreed and imposed the 30-month prison sentence last week, The Wichita Eagle reported.

Authorities said a demonstrator at the rally reported to Officer Stephen Linarez that a man was driving erratically and attempting to hit several rally members, according to an arrest affidavit.

When Linarez intervened, Young initially drove away but then turned around and drove directly toward the officer https://www.kansascity.com/news/state/kansas/article258420588.html

_source.content: Great news! NY Teachers denied religious exemptions get 2nd chance at US Supreme CourtGreat news! A group of fired New York teachers denied religious exemptions from vaccine mandates by Mayors Eric Adams and Bill de Blasio got a second chance at a full hearing by the US Supreme Court yesterday. Justice Neil Gorsuch granted a request to consider an expedited review that was rejected last Friday by Justice Sonia Sotomayor. Sotomayor has jurisdiction over requests for expedited review of decisions from lower courts in New York. The plaintiffs in Kane v. de Blasio exercised a right to appeal Sotomayor’s decision. More than 1400 City workers were terminated last Friday for refusing to get the Covid shot. Written arguments will be presented in the first week of March. If four of the nine Justices approve, the case will go to a hearing by the full Court. The Court could potentially reinstate the teachers and other New York City workers who were denied religious exemptions from Covid shots required by an emergency Executive Order from the Mayors to remain employed.
_source.contentraw:
Great news! NY Teachers denied religious exemptions get 2nd chance at US Supreme Court

Great news! A group of fired New York teachers denied religious exemptions from vaccine mandates by Mayors Eric Adams and Bill de Blasio got a second chance at a full hearing by the US Supreme Court yesterday.

Justice Neil Gorsuch granted a request to consider an expedited review that was rejected last Friday by Justice Sonia Sotomayor. Sotomayor has jurisdiction over requests for expedited review of decisions from lower courts in New York. The plaintiffs in Kane v. de Blasio exercised a right to appeal Sotomayor’s decision.

More than 1400 City workers were terminated last Friday for refusing to get the Covid shot.

Written arguments will be presented in the first week of March. If four of the nine Justices approve, the case will go to a hearing by the full Court.

The Court could potentially reinstate the teachers and other New York City workers who were denied religious exemptions from Covid shots required by an emergency Executive Order from the Mayors to remain employed.

_source.content: Pitcher Matt Harvey recently testified in the trial of Eric Kay, the man accused of supplying Tyler Skaggs the drugs on which he overdosed and died.The prosecution granted Harvey immunity for anything he might say. And he said a lot. The former "Dark Knight", darling of the New York Mets, who started an all start game in his just his second season, is a drug abuser. Cocaine and Oxycodone are his favorites. At age 33 he's been one of the worst pitchers in the majors for many years. While he is immune from criminal prosecution, he was granted no such waiver from Major League Baseball. News sources speculate he could be suspended if any team actually signs him. Once one of the most promising young pitchers in baseball, Harvey pissed away his career by his mid-twenties. Not bad for a White guy.

card.title: Covid-19 : "On n'a pas assez de données sur la sécurité des vaccins", s'inquiètent des scientifiques

_source.content: 28 novembre 2020 Covid-19 : « On n’a pas assez de données sur la sécurité des vaccins », s’inquiètent des scientifiques« Je trouve que l’on a encore un "excès de précipitation", je n’ai toujours pas vu les études publiées de toxicité et d’efficacité des deux vaccins dont on parle le plus : le vaccin américain et le deuxième vaccin américain (Moderna et Pfizer, ndrl). Pour l’instant on n’a même pas les résultats de ces études », selon le chef du service des maladies infectieuses et tropicales de l’hôpital de La Pitié-Salpêtrière Eric Caumes.Même constat pour l’épidémiologiste Catherine Hill. « On est raisonnablement certains qu’il n’y a rien de très grave qui se produit avec une fréquence supérieure à 1 pour 1000. Mais vous allez vacciner des millions de gens, vous allez commencer par vacciner les soignants. Si vous en dézinguez 1 pour 1 000, ce n’est pas possible, on ne veut pas un vaccin comme ça. C’est beaucoup trop grave. On n’a pas assez de données sur la sécurité des vaccins. Il faut attendre d’avoir plus de gens et plus de suivi », a-t-elle expliqué sur LCI.https://www.epochtimes.fr/covid-19-on-na-pas-assez-de-donnees-sur-la-securite-des-vaccins-sinquietent-des-scientifiques-1604426.html
_source.contentraw:
28 novembre 2020

Covid-19 : « On n’a pas assez de données sur la sécurité des vaccins », s’inquiètent des scientifiques

« Je trouve que l’on a encore un "excès de précipitation", je n’ai toujours pas vu les études publiées de toxicité et d’efficacité des deux vaccins dont on parle le plus : le vaccin américain et le deuxième vaccin américain (Moderna et Pfizer, ndrl). Pour l’instant on n’a même pas les résultats de ces études », selon le chef du service des maladies infectieuses et tropicales de l’hôpital de La Pitié-Salpêtrière Eric Caumes.

Même constat pour l’épidémiologiste Catherine Hill.

« On est raisonnablement certains qu’il n’y a rien de très grave qui se produit avec une fréquence supérieure à 1 pour 1000. Mais vous allez vacciner des millions de gens, vous allez commencer par vacciner les soignants. Si vous en dézinguez 1 pour 1 000, ce n’est pas possible, on ne veut pas un vaccin comme ça. C’est beaucoup trop grave. On n’a pas assez de données sur la sécurité des vaccins. Il faut attendre d’avoir plus de gens et plus de suivi », a-t-elle expliqué sur LCI.

https://www.epochtimes.fr/covid-19-on-na-pas-assez-de-donnees-sur-la-securite-des-vaccins-sinquietent-des-scientifiques-1604426.html

card.description: Coronavirus policies are beginning to boomerang on Democrats as polls underscore public fatigue with both the pandemic and the rules and mandates intended to keep it from spreading.
card.title: COVID-19 rules boomerang on Democrats

_source.content: Rules for "thee" slaves Democrat communists want Americans to be, but no rules for "me" elites. Bunch of shitbag politicians who hate freedom and liberty and the Constitution.Coronavirus policies are beginning to boomerang on Democrats as polls underscore public fatigue with both the pandemic and the rules and mandates intended to keep it from spreading.The party’s generally strict stance on coronavirus safety measures could end up backfiring as Democrats find themselves on defense going into the midterm elections.Republicans are already using the issue to go on the offense against Democrats, calling it hypocritical.“The science never changed. The science didn’t matter,” said Joanna Rodriguez, deputy communications director at the Republican Governor’s Association. “The science was an excuse they used in order to control people’s lives and rule people in a way that they felt was appropriate while they played by their own rules.”Republicans point to examples of Democrats appearing maskless in public settings as signs of what they say is their hypocrisy on the issue. California Gov. Gavin Newsom (D) and Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti (D), along with most fans, appeared maskless in photos at the Super Bowl on Sunday despite Los Angeles County’s mask mandate for large outdoor events.Meanwhile, Georgia Democratic gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams became the subject of GOP backlash when she appeared maskless in a photo with masked schoolchildren. Abrams later apologized.https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/594603-democrats-face-blowback-over-covid-19-policies
_source.contentraw:
Rules for "thee" slaves Democrat communists want Americans to be, but no rules for "me" elites. Bunch of shitbag politicians who hate freedom and liberty and the Constitution.

Coronavirus policies are beginning to boomerang on Democrats as polls underscore public fatigue with both the pandemic and the rules and mandates intended to keep it from spreading.

The party’s generally strict stance on coronavirus safety measures could end up backfiring as Democrats find themselves on defense going into the midterm elections.

Republicans are already using the issue to go on the offense against Democrats, calling it hypocritical.

“The science never changed. The science didn’t matter,” said Joanna Rodriguez, deputy communications director at the Republican Governor’s Association. “The science was an excuse they used in order to control people’s lives and rule people in a way that they felt was appropriate while they played by their own rules.”

Republicans point to examples of Democrats appearing maskless in public settings as signs of what they say is their hypocrisy on the issue. California Gov. Gavin Newsom (D) and Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti (D), along with most fans, appeared maskless in photos at the Super Bowl on Sunday despite Los Angeles County’s mask mandate for large outdoor events.

Meanwhile, Georgia Democratic gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams became the subject of GOP backlash when she appeared maskless in a photo with masked schoolchildren. Abrams later apologized.

https://thehill.com/homenews/campaign/594603-democrats-face-blowback-over-covid-19-policies

card.title: Los Angeles County JUST Ended Its Outdoor Mask Mandate

_source.content: Los Angeles County JUST Ended Its Outdoor Mask Mandatehttps://townhall.com/tipsheet/rebeccadowns/2022/02/16/los-angeles-county-just-ended-its-outdoor-mask-mandate-n2603386?utm_source=thdaily&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nl&bcid=8596abb6b08ec4c13df92f5579258be998cdbdd08ce4fe4c6057e256a21577f0&recip=28649704Wednesday morning, Los Angeles County lifted its outdoor mask mandate, according to a report from a local ABC News affiliate. The report mentions that this coincides with the lifting of an indoor mask mandate for those who are fully vaccinated at the state level, though LA County will still require fully vaccinated people to wear masks indoors. This also coincides with the Rams victory party to celebrate their Super Bowl win. Twitter reacted with surprise that there was even an outdoor mask mandate to begin with, which applies to K-12 schools, child care centers, and outdoor mega-events. Why were they wearing masks outdoors in the first place?!?— Walker HEXas Ranger (@HEXas_ranger) February 16, 2022Such news comes soon after the Super Bowl took place on Sunday at the indoor-outdoor SoFi Stadium, where the victorious Los Angeles Rams play. As Leah highlighted on Monday, numerous celebrities were caught maskless, including but certainly not limited to Mayor Eric Garcetti. This is not the first time he's been caught without a mask, and his previous excuse for not wearing one was that he was holding his breath to pose for a picture with former NBA Laker Magic Johnson, who is HIV positive. No one wore a mask. No celebrity. Not Lebron or anyone or political figure. No one.   Kids will be masked tomorrow at school. https://t.co/ChNelItIhw — Stephen L. Miller (@Redsteeze) February 14, 2022

Wednesday morning, Los Angeles County lifted its outdoor mask mandate, according to a report from a local ABC News affiliate. The report mentions that this coincides with the lifting of an indoor mask mandate for those who are fully vaccinated at the state level, though LA County will still require fully vaccinated people to wear masks indoors. This also coincides with the Rams victory party to celebrate their Super Bowl win.

Twitter reacted with surprise that there was even an outdoor mask mandate to begin with, which applies to K-12 schools, child care centers, and outdoor mega-events.

Why were they wearing masks outdoors in the first place?!?
— Walker HEXas Ranger (@HEXas_ranger) February 16, 2022

Such news comes soon after the Super Bowl took place on Sunday at the indoor-outdoor SoFi Stadium, where the victorious Los Angeles Rams play. As Leah highlighted on Monday, numerous celebrities were caught maskless, including but certainly not limited to Mayor Eric Garcetti. This is not the first time he's been caught without a mask, and his previous excuse for not wearing one was that he was holding his breath to pose for a picture with former NBA Laker Magic Johnson, who is HIV positive.

No one wore a mask. No celebrity. Not Lebron or anyone or political figure. No one. Kids will be masked tomorrow at school. https://t.co/ChNelItIhw — Stephen L. Miller (@Redsteeze) February 14, 2022

card.description: 🗣️ @Verhaeghe : « L'euro numérique est l’étape décisive de la grande arnaque qui permettra de faire fonctionner une société totalement dystopique, presque sans échappatoire au contrôle généralisé de la population. » @CStrateges L’entretien complet ➡ https://t.co/gVU9fhkZBo pic.twitter.com/hOBISSViVJ — Epoch Times France (@EpochTimesFR) February 15, 2022 … ADVERTISEMENT
card.title: Eric Verhaeghe : "L'euro numérique est l’étape décisive de la grande arnaque qui permettra de faire fonctionner une société totalement dystopique, presque sans échappatoire au contrôle généralisé de la population" - PLANETES360

_source.content: https://planetes360.fr/eric-verhaeghe-leuro-numerique-est-letape-decisive-de-la-grande-arnaque-qui-permettra-de-faire-fonctionner-une-societe-totalement-dystopique-presque-sans-echappatoire-au-controle-gener/Prévu à l'origine pour 2025, l'Euro numérique permettra de contrôler les individus, dans les plus petits actes de leur vie privée.Son lancement vient d'être avancé en 2023.A titre d'exemple, regardez comment Trudeau veut contraindre les truckers à déguerpir, en gelant leurs avoirs bancaires... Imaginez que les camioneurs n'aient pas de cash en réserve ou un compte au USA de dépannage s'ils sont canadiens....De même pour l'impôt, les amendes : on se servira du jour au lendemain, sans préavis sur votre compte unique et numérique, sans moyen de s'y opposer...La tyrannie par :L'identité numériqueL'euro numériqueL'interdiction du cash, unique échappatoire à la tyrannieLa fin des banquesLe totalitarisme numériqueOn va à grands pas vers une société, où la dépendance des individus et le droit de vie ou de mort sociale, des supra-Etats sur chacun, par une effroyable clique mondialiste sera total. L'ère du totalitarisme numérique mondialisé a sonné, le passeport sanitaire en a été le prémisse.Apocalypse 13:16-17Et elle fit que tous, petits et grands, riches et pauvres, libres et esclaves, reçussent une marque sur leur main droite ou sur leur front, et que personne ne pût acheter ni vendre, sans avoir la marque, le nom de la bête ou le nombre de son nom.Apocalypse 16:2Concept des Versets Le premier alla, et il versa sa coupe sur la terre. Et un ulcère malin et douloureux frappa les hommes qui avaient la marque de la bête et qui adoraient son image.Apocalypse 20:4Et je vis des trônes; et à ceux qui s'y assirent fut donné le pouvoir de juger. Et je vis les âmes de ceux qui avaient été décapités à cause du témoignage de Jésus et à cause de la parole de Dieu, et de ceux qui n'avaient pas adoré la bête ni son image, et qui n'avaient pas reçu la marque sur leur front et sur leur main. Ils revinrent à la vie, et ils régnèrent avec Christ pendant mille ans.
_source.contentraw:
https://planetes360.fr/eric-verhaeghe-leuro-numerique-est-letape-decisive-de-la-grande-arnaque-qui-permettra-de-faire-fonctionner-une-societe-totalement-dystopique-presque-sans-echappatoire-au-controle-gener/
Prévu à l'origine pour 2025, l'Euro numérique permettra de contrôler les individus, dans les plus petits actes de leur vie privée.
Son lancement vient d'être avancé en 2023.


A titre d'exemple, regardez comment Trudeau veut contraindre les truckers à déguerpir, en gelant leurs avoirs bancaires... Imaginez que les camioneurs n'aient pas de cash en réserve ou un compte au USA de dépannage s'ils sont canadiens....
De même pour l'impôt, les amendes : on se servira du jour au lendemain, sans préavis sur votre compte unique et numérique, sans moyen de s'y opposer...


La tyrannie par :
L'identité numérique
L'euro numérique
L'interdiction du cash, unique échappatoire à la tyrannie
La fin des banques
Le totalitarisme numérique

On va à grands pas vers une société, où la dépendance des individus et le droit de vie ou de mort sociale, des supra-Etats sur chacun, par une effroyable clique mondialiste sera total. L'ère du totalitarisme numérique mondialisé a sonné, le passeport sanitaire en a été le prémisse.

Apocalypse 13:16-17
Et elle fit que tous, petits et grands, riches et pauvres, libres et esclaves, reçussent une marque sur leur main droite ou sur leur front, et que personne ne pût acheter ni vendre, sans avoir la marque, le nom de la bête ou le nombre de son nom.

Apocalypse 16:2
Concept des Versets 
Le premier alla, et il versa sa coupe sur la terre. Et un ulcère malin et douloureux frappa les hommes qui avaient la marque de la bête et qui adoraient son image.


Apocalypse 20:4

Et je vis des trônes; et à ceux qui s'y assirent fut donné le pouvoir de juger. Et je vis les âmes de ceux qui avaient été décapités à cause du témoignage de Jésus et à cause de la parole de Dieu, et de ceux qui n'avaient pas adoré la bête ni son image, et qui n'avaient pas reçu la marque sur leur front et sur leur main. Ils revinrent à la vie, et ils régnèrent avec Christ pendant mille ans.
